name: bj-spimvv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Version of ~ spimv and ~ spimv1 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . UPDATE: this is ~ spimvw (but different proof). (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
